S

score - Variable in class Hand
 
Score - Class in <Unnamed>
This class is pretty straight forward, it takes in the faces of the dice and scores them for each of the possible scoring categories.
Score() - Constructor for class Score
 
scoreDice() - Method in class Hand
This methods turns the arraylist hand into a normal array which is then exported to the Score class along with teh other private variables
setupConfigurations() - Method in class Player
This method asks the user if they want to change any of the preset parameters of the game such as number of dice and then loads those changes into the game
setupHand(int, int, int) - Method in class Hand
Sets up hand where it imports the three values from player (called in player) as well as sets initial values in the two ArrayLists to 0 and n
setupScore(int, int, int, Integer[]) - Method in class Score
Similar to the setup hand method from the hand class, this method imports the same values except for the hand array of integers
showRoll() - Method in class Hand
Displays each one of the dice using a loop
showScorecard() - Method in class Score
Calls all of the scoring methods in the class in the correct order which calculates and prints the scoreboard
sides - Variable in class Hand
 
sides - Variable in class Player
 
sides - Variable in class Score
 
smallStr() - Method in class Score
checks for small straight by looping through and seeing if the following element is one larger than the current element.
sortDice() - Method in class Hand
Sorts the ArrayList hand into numerical order using a bubble sort
